author: Jan Wolfe
title: Inventor hits JPMorgan with lawsuit alleging infringement of payment patent
text:
A Philadelphia-based inventor on Thursday hit JPMorgan Chase & Co with a patent infringement lawsuit, less than two months after a U.S. appeals court tossed a similar case he brought against McDonaldâ€™s Corp.
William Grecia sued JPMorgan in federal court in Manhattan, alleging infringement of a patent he obtained in 2014 on a cloud-based system for authorizing access to digital content.
To read the full story on Westlaw Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2FnnCHG
